mapper.select: SELECT v.id AS visit_id, v.created_at AS visit_date, s.id AS store_id, s.name AS store_name, s.address AS store_address, MAX(b.country) AS bean_origin, m.name AS menu_name FROM passport_visits pv INNER JOIN visits v ON pv.visit_id = v.id INNER JOIN menus m ON v.menu_id = m.id INNER JOIN stores s ON m.store_id = s.id LEFT JOIN menu_bean_mappings mbm ON m.id = mbm.menu_id LEFT JOIN beans b ON mbm.bean_id = b.id WHERE pv.passport_id = #{passportId} AND v.menu_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY v.id, v.created_at, s.id, s.name, s.address, m.name ORDER BY v.created_at ASC
